    private void _materialComboBoxActionPerformed( java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt )
    {
        _materialName = _materialComboBox.getSelectedItem().toString();
    }

    private void _xCoordinateTextFieldActionPerformed( java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt )
    {
        _xCoordinate = Integer.parseInt( _xCoordinateTextField.getText() );
    }

    private void _yCoordinateTextFieldActionPerformed( java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt )
    {
        _yCoordinate = Integer.parseInt( _yCoordinateTextField.getText() );
    }

    private void _zCoordinateTextFieldActionPerformed( java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt )
    {

    }

    private void _xSizeTextFieldActionPerformed( java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt )
    {
        _xSize = Integer.parseInt( _xSizeTextField.getText() );
    }

    private void _ySizeTextFieldActionPerformed( java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt )
    {
        _ySize = Integer.parseInt( _ySizeTextField.getText() );
    }

    private void _zSizeTextFieldActionPerformed( java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt )
    {
        _zSize = Integer.parseInt( _zSizeTextField.getText() );
    }

    private void _addButtonActionPerformed( java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt )
    {
        Point3d blockCenter = new Point3d( _xCoordinate + _xSize / 2.0,
            _yCoordinate + _ySize / 2.0, _zCoordinate + _zSize / 2.0 );
        _editedScene
                .addNewBlock( _materialName, blockCenter, new Point3d( _xSize, _ySize, _zSize ) );
    }
